text: The 2017 UNAF U-18 Tournament was the 10th edition of the UNAF U-20 Tournament which was apparently changed from U-20 to U-18. The tournament took place in Tunisia, from 26 April to 2 May 2017. Tunisia won the tournament. ==Participants== * * * * (hosts) ==Tournament== ===Matches=== \---- \---- ==Winners== ==References== ==External links== * 2017 UNAF U-18 Tournament champion - Official website Category:2017 in African football UNAF U-20 Tournament Category:UNAF U-18 Tournament
title: 2017 UNAF U-18 Tournament
